title: Group of eighteen women, including one wearing light colored sleeveless dress with lace overlay over skirt, sheer solid colored shawl, corsage around wrist, dark purse on arm, and pendant necklace standing with hand holding opposite elbow and other hand on table looking forward, standing at head table with flowers and two candlestick holders with two tall candles each, in interior, solid colored curtain with decorations, and other tables in background, possibly banquet
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
